title: FS: 20 T206 with HOF's, SL's, Stars, and a Color Shift Error Final Price CUT

posts.post_title: FS: 20 T206 with HOF's, SL's, Stars, and a Color Shift Error Final Price CUT
posts.post_content:
20 T206's for sale. Add $2.00 for shipping unless you buy 3 or more, then shipping is on me. Check preferred. Paypal accepted, but add 2%. PM me or email at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url]. If you need larger scans, let me know by email. Feel free to make an offer. All cards moved to eBay.
